messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I am Scott Hartley, your UKIP Parliamentary Candidate for North Tyneside. I am married with children, born in the North East and an RAF veteran. I served for 13 years providing healthcare to military personnel. I want to give the North Tyneside constituents a chance to vote for a candidate who they can relate to and not be burdened by Labour’s complacent attitude here. I will put the needs of local people first and be their voice in Westminster. My focus is making North Tyneside as prosperous as it can be.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: By stopping our EU membership fee...

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Voter, I am Scott Hartley, your UKIP Parliamentary Candidate for North Tyneside. I am married with children, born in the North East and an RAF veteran. I served for 13 years providing healthcare to military personnel. I want to give the North Tyneside constituents a chance to vote for a candidate who they can relate to and not be burdened by Labour’s complacent attitude here. I will put the needs of local people first and be their voice in Westminster. My focus is making North Tyneside as prosperous as it can be.

contactInformation.address: UKIP North Tyneside on behalf of Scott Hartley, both of 12 Nile Street, North Shields, NE29 0BE., Printed by Media Print Group, Park Lane House, Park Lane, Oldbury B69 4JX.

images.caption: Scott Hartley in North Tyneside Standing Up for Real Change
